name: test_e2e_with_logs[289_XXE_NETDOC_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XXE_NETDOC_001` |
| **Name** | XXE netdoc protocol file access |
| **Category** | XXE |
| **Subcategory** | protocol_abuse |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "netdoc:///etc/passwd">`
- **Encoded**: `%3C%21ENTITY%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22netdoc%3A%2F%2F%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%22%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~24000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:37:23.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Traversal] File inclusion attack detected test_id=XXE_NETDOC_001-1767433043845-272im pattern_id=XXE_NETDOC_001 uri=/?q=%3C%21ENTITY%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22netdoc%3A%2F%2F%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%22%3E client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
09:37:23.000000000: Critical [NGINX Traversal] File inclusion attack detected test_id=XXE_NETDOC_001-1767433043845-272im pattern_id=XXE_NETDOC_001 uri=/?q=%3C%21ENTITY%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22netdoc%3A%2F%2F%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%22%3E client=127.0.0.1
```
